definition: lit. to cut one's way through thistles and thorns (idiom)/fig. to overcome all obstacles on the way/to break through hardships/to blaze a new trail
echinoderm, the phylum containing sea urchins, sea cucumbers etc
lit. a path covered in brambles/a course of action beset by difficulties (idiom)
Tsintaosaurus spinorhinus, a 10 meter long hadrosaur with a single horn on its duck-billed snout
to eat bitter fruit and lie on thorns (idiom); to share the hard life of the common people

sentences.english: Over the course of four weeks, they spotted coelacanths only six times.
sentences.chinese: 在长达四周的活动中，他们仅有六次观察到腔棘鱼。

sentences.english: Occasional enlarged and rounded spines were also seen in control slices.
sentences.chinese: 偶尔在对照的脑片上可以看见增粗和圆形的树突棘。

sentences.english: In addition, the foramen spinosum and the sulcus of arteria meningea media were also observed.
sentences.chinese: 同时本文还描述了棘孔和脑膜中动脉沟。

sentences.english: The rabbit model of Acanthamoeba keratitis was successfully established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了家兔棘阿米巴角膜炎动物模型。

sentences.english: The sacrotuberous and sacrospinous ligaments provide additional support posteriorly.
sentences.chinese: 骶结节韧带和骶棘韧带提供额外的后方支撑。

sentences.english: But how might dim light have brought about dendritic spine changes?
sentences.chinese: 但是昏暗光是如何引起树突棘数量变化的呢？

sentences.english: The spinous cells showed more active proliferating growth than the basal cells of keratocyst.
sentences.chinese: 角化囊肿棘细胞增殖较基底细胞活跃。

sentences.english: The present paper deals with a comparative study on the skeleton systems of Parargyrops edita and Sparus latusa.
sentences.chinese: 对二长棘鲷和黄鳍鲷的骨骼系统进行了比较研究。

sentences.english: The coelacanth's slow, graceful stroke is like no other fish's.
sentences.chinese: 与其他鱼类不同，腔棘鱼划水动作缓慢而优雅。

sentences.english: A jagged bolt protrudes from the concrete walls of the tunnel.
sentences.chinese: 原来是管道水泥壁上突出的一个棘螺栓。
